name: Bullet Heck (Ninja)
description:
Left Click: Shoot
Right Click/Space: Dash
WASD: Move

INSTRUCTIONS:
Get as many points as possible before the timer (top left) runs out.
shoot the skull targets to get 500 points
you get 100 points every second. as well as an additional 100 per target you've destroyed. the game only lasts for 20 seconds, so shoot the targets fast!
the more targets you shoot, the faster targets (and enemy bullets) spawn
after dashing, wait for the dash cooldown sound to know when your dash is ready again.
